data.name: FUTURE NOIR
data.detailed_description:
FUTURE NOIR is a first-person adventure game that combines elements of both first-person shooters and walking simulators. You play agent Langley, a detective in charge of solving a crime that will lead to the most remote places in a dystopian future in search of clues and evidence for his investigation. But as time passes, everything starts to get complicated and the difference between reality and dreams slowly becomes inexistent, pushing Langley to the limit and to discover things that perhaps would have been better not to know.



THE WORLD

The game takes place on Earth, a planet in ruins that has been suffering a nuclear winter for decades. Humanity has spread throughout the solar system, with colonies on the Moon, Mars, Venus, and the moons of Jupiter, Saturn, and Uranus.



THE GAMEPLAY

FUTURE NOIR has a unique combination of elements: first-person shooter and walking simulator mechanics mixed with adventure, exploration, action, suspense and terror, as well as interesting characters and a great story waiting to be discovered.

You must solve a crime that will take you to remote places in a dystopian future and lead you to discover things that perhaps you were better off without knowing. Are you ready?
